values:
I'm going to hurt you later for awking me, Richard.
Afterlife as an Angel by childdoll
Your Name
Astrological Sign
Angel TypeAngel of Nature
Wing ColorBlack with red tips
Heavenly WeaponLightning rod
Created with quill18's MemeGen!
...Nature? Well, I suppose so, seeing as I don't mind being outside... at night... or shady days... cloudy, rainy.... yeah. At least the wings look cool.

This is really trying my patience being here. Badly. However, Richard came through with something amusing. I don't think I've smiled once since I got here... but this did it.
The Potion Maker
triptych_highium is a milky, pasty ochre gel gleaned from the pollen of the mandrake.
shadowemeraldium is an opaque, swirling puce liquid drained from the root of a honeysuckle.
Mixing triptych_highium with shadowemeraldium causes a violent chemical reaction, producing a milky fuchsia potion which gives the user protection from thieves.
Yet another fun meme brought to you by rfreebern
Protection from Thieves... well, if my own nature didn't do that... Richard's psychosis[es] would. I'm going back to that dark room now... better then ebing anywhere near daytime light or anythig else right now. It's making me cranky. Edit: JOSH! Buddy boy... good work on getting this way... was worried the cold would damage you or something. FIRELIGHT I could use. Not daylight. It makes me gloomy and stuff. And I fogrgot something, but thsi si a good laugh anyway.
The Potion Maker
cyrixflamearium is a translucent, gritty green powder pulled from the brain of a hawk.
shadowemeraldium is an opaque, swirling puce liquid drained from the root of a honeysuckle.
Mixing cyrixflamearium with shadowemeraldium causes a violent chemical reaction, producing a translucent amber potion which gives the user the power of instantaneous healing.
Yet another fun meme brought to you by rfreebern
The Potion Maker
shadowemeraldium is an opaque, swirling puce liquid drained from the root of a honeysuckle.
Mix with shadowemerald! Username:
Yet another fun meme brought to you by rfreebern

Karadontia, I owe you one.  Thanks for finding me and giving me acess and stuff.

I'm alive, and well... well, alive.  Not so well.  Someone better come get me, cause I AM NOT going outside.

....

I hate this place.  I really do.

This is not good for me, dammit.  I can't hide things forever.

*sigh*
